text:
Creator Deck Media | San Francisco, CA | Onsite | http://www.creatordeckmedia.com

Creator Deck Media is an innovative media company specializing in creating useful and personalized content that resonates with highly defined customer niches. Creator Deck Media capitalizes on its core values to listen, understand, and translate a vision to an idea or product that can elevate and inspire its viewers.

To learn more about who we are, our engineering culture, and whether this is the right place for you, read our Key Values profile: https://www.keyvalues.com/creator-deck-media

Here are our open roles:

- Software Engineer: http://www.creatordeckmedia.com/careers/

Tech Stack: Main technologies: Ruby on Rails HTML CSS Javascript AWS SES, S3 Cloud hosted backed with AWS
